title: Michael Heseltine – 2007 Speech on the Cities
author: admin
summary: The below speech was made by Michael Heseltine on 30th September 2007.
content:
When parts of our cities erupted in riots a quarter of a century ago, I asked the Prime Minister to release me to walk the streets of Liverpool.
